medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began more than 6 years ago and have progressively worsened. The patient experiences unstable walking, frequent falls, slow walking speed, inability to squat or get up independently, reluctance to climb stairs, and inability to run. She occasionally complains of abdominal pain, has difficulty controlling stool, and experiences occasional bedwetting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient's older brother had a similar history of weakness in both lower limbs that progressed to general weakness and died at the age of 16. No other past medical history is specified.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's parents are cousins. The older brother had a similar condition and died at 16 years old. A healthy 12-year-old sister is mentioned.
